text:
RADIO STATION
91.7 MC
WHOM
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
ANN ARBOR. MICH.
WALDO ABBOT. DIRECTOR OF BROADCASTING
E. G. BURROWS, program director
September l6, 1952
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
Station WUOA, Univ. of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
The most interesting part of your letter
concerning the proposals for a replacement
for Jim was the last paragraph. Congratulations
upon your new home. I hope to learn more about
it and, someday, to see it. I thoroughly enjoyed
my stay in the one you’re giving up but then it
is the people in the home that makes the home.
The plan set forth in your letter sounds very
good to me.
Cordially yours,
 
T¥aldo Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
: 7 A/mm
